task.title: Create a Snapshot
task.shortdesc: A snapshot is a block level storage volume that is created by copying an existing volume and is backed by persistent storage. You can use snapshots to create new volumes to be used with your instances.

task.title: General tab
task.shortdesc: Add the details of your snapshot:

step.cmd: Enter a name for the volume in the Name text box.
Start typing a volume ID (they usually start with "vol-") in the Volume text field, and then select a volume name from the drop-down list.
Enter a description for the volume in the Description text box.
Click the Create button to create your new snapshot, or click the Cancel button to cancel the operation.
Click the Create button to save your work, or click the Cancel button to cancel the operation.
